long_description: Look sharp during transition seasons when cool breezes and rain showers may curb your style. The men's plaid prAna Yukon soft-shell jacket offers urban good looks, water resistance and light warmth. Polyester/spandex shell provides 4-way stretch so you won't feel hindered during outdoor activities. Durable water repellent finish sheds light precipitation. Brushed-tricot backing feels soft and offers lightweight warmth. PrAna Yukon jacket features Old West-style pockets on the chest and left arm. Zippered front; zippered welted hand pockets; internal media port.
short_description: Look sharp during transition seasons when cool breezes and rain showers may curb your style. The men's plaid prAna Yukon soft-shell jacket offers urban good looks, water resistance and light warmth.
